# idli-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                     | Type                                                       | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | If true, the user cannot interact with the button. Defaults to `false`.                         | `boolean`                                                  | `false`     |
| `expand`   | `expand`   | Set to `"block"` for a full-width button or to `"full"` for a full-width button.                | `"block" \| "full"`                                        | `undefined` |
| `size`     | `size`     | The button size. Possible values are: `"sm"`, `"md"`, `"lg"`.                                   | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"`                                     | `undefined` |
| `variant`  | `variant`  | Button variants Possible values are `"default"`, `"default"`, `"dashed"`, `"danger"`, `"link"`. | `"danger" \| "dashed" \| "default" \| "link" \| "primary"` | `undefined` |
